title: Sajid Javid – 2021 Comments on Social Care
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 10 December 2021.
content:
Throughout the pandemic we have done everything we can to protect the adult social care sector, and the emergence of the Omicron variant means this is more important than ever.
